formalpara.title: Figure 17.
formalpara.para: A tph-1::gfp reporter is expressed in the NSMs in the anterior part of the pharynx. A. One fluorescent cell can be detected on each side (left and right) of a wild-type animal. B. In a ces-1(gf) animal, the surviving NSM sister cell can be visualized by gfp expression posterior to the NSM (Julia Hatzold and Barbara Conradt).
